results.title: Pyroptosis and its role in intestinal ischemia-reperfusion injury: a potential therapeutic target.
results.text_hl: Compounds like @CHEMICAL_N_(1_2_3_5_6_7_hexahydro_S_indacen_4_ylcarbamoyl)_4_(2_hydroxy_2_propanyl)_2_furansulfonamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000597426 @@@MCC950@@@, CY-09, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@ have shown promise in attenuating II/@<m>DISEASE_Charcot_Marie_Tooth_Disease_Recessive_Intermediate_A</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564256 @@@RI@@@ in preclinical studies by modulating these pathways.

citations.NLM: Xu W, Wang L, Chen R, Liu Y, Chen W. Pyroptosis and its role in intestinal ischemia-reperfusion injury: a potential therapeutic target. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2025 May 15;():. PMID: 40372474
